title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) Application Strategy Design in Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design educational scenarios applying the three UDL principles (representation, action & expression, engagement) in online environments
Learners can analyze UDL priority factors by target group using the Q-sort survey tool.
Learners can develop multimodal learning materials that comply with digital accessibility (ADA) standards.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
